A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ruins all the cool stuff JJ set up in TFA. Like Rey's mysterious parents\, and the crazy powerful ancient Snoke. Both those mysteries turn out to be nothing in this film. They didn't even have a real lightsaber fight. For a saga film\, that's a first. They missed an opportunity to do something really special with the return of Luke Skywalker. Fuck Rian Johnson. I'm now worried about what he's gonna do with his own trilogy.
